divs: Sighting Detailsthree glowing orbs traveling together, My best friend and myself were traveling back from Ohio traveling south on I-95 at 4:25am on my left side as I was traveling south three orbs were traveling about 180MPH. I woke up my friend and told him to look at three UFOS. I was about to pull over to the side of the road to take a picture when the UFOS changed direction to the west and and accelerated to fantastic speed.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around June 24th 2013
